title: HTC Clock
description: Whether you're in Taipei, Taiwan or Marrakech, Morocco, HTC Clock lets you check the time in your current location, at home and in cities around the world. Its customizable alarms, stopwatch and timer put the power of time management in your pocket, too. Set as many alarms as you like, change the snooze duration, choose the sound that plays when alarms go off and even make alarms sound when your phone is on silent. HTC Clock's stopwatch is great for recording laps while working out, and the timer is handy for cooking or monitoring time in front of the TV. HTC, the HTC logo and other HTC product and service names referenced in the Application are the trademarks or registered trademarks of HTC Corporation in the United States and other countries. Any other company names, product names, service names and logos referenced in connection with the Application may be the trademarks of their respective owners."
short_desc: Keep track of time with HTC's sleek stopwatch, timer, alarm and world clock.
what_is_new:
- New alarms are set to "Do not repeat" by default
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
